title.value: Using neural biomarkers to personalize dosing of vagus nerve stimulation
title.justification: The title is clearly mentioned at the beginning of the research paper.
title.quote: Using neural biomarkers to personalize dosing of vagus nerve stimulation

extractions.description: This paper investigates the relationship between vagus nerve stimulation parameters, neural responses, and short-term physiological responses to optimize personalized VNS dosing procedures. The research utilizes recorded evoked neural activity and physiological responses in pigs to understand the effects and adjust VNS therapy parameters.

type.justification: The paper conducts experiments using pigs to test different VNS parameters and measure neural and physiological responses, indicating empirical research.
type.quote: Methods: We used biomarkers from recorded evoked neural activity and short-term physiological responses... in anaesthetised pigs.

name.justification: The study focuses on neural responses and physiological effects related to vagus nerve stimulation, primarily falling under the field of neuroscience.
name.quote: Understanding of evoked neural activity during VNS provide powerful biomarkers that could improve the precision, safety and efficacy of VNS therapies.

name.justification: The paper discusses technologies related to neural interfaces and stimulation techniques, aligning with biomedical engineering.
name.quote: Three cuffs (Microprobes, NC, US) were placed about 2 cm caudally to the nodose ganglion, with the most caudal cuff used for stimulation.

name.justification: The research aims to optimize VNS therapy for human treatments, indicating an application in clinical science.
name.quote: ...design of personalized dosing procedures to improve precision and efficacy of VNS therapies.

name.justification: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Gaussian processes for analysis.
name.quote: Using signal processing, Gaussian processes (GP) and parametric regression models we analyse the relationship between VNS parameters and neural and physiological responses.

is_contributed.justification: Gaussian Processes are a standard statistical method, not developed in the paper.
is_contributed.quote: Using signal processing, Gaussian processes (GP) and parametric regression models...

is_executed.justification: Gaussian Processes were used as a tool within the research methodology to analyze data.
is_executed.quote: Using signal processing, Gaussian processes (GP) and parametric regression models...

is_compared.justification: Gaussian Processes were used for analysis, not comparison between models.
is_compared.quote: Using signal processing, Gaussian processes (GP) and parametric regression models...

referenced_paper_title.justification: The Gaussian Processes model is mentioned without reference to a specific paper title.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Using signal processing, Gaussian processes (GP) and parametric regression models...

name.justification: The Pandas library is explicitly mentioned as being used for data processing.
name.quote: ...The heart rate (HR) is calculated from RR distance and interpolated by the interpolate function (method pchip) from the Pandas (team, 2020) Python package.

referenced_paper_title.justification: Pandas is a standard library used for data analysis and not specifically referenced from a paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: ...using the interpolate function (method pchip) from the Pandas (team, 2020) Python package.
